players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob was killed last night, so he must be mafia. Vote him out."
Charlie: "I think Alice is mafia; she accused Bob wrongly."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found him to be mafia. Bob was killed; the mafia must be Charlie. Alice, you are innocent."
You: "I agree with Diana. Bob was killed by mafia, so he was innocent. Charlie must be mafia. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "Alice, you are the mafia. Vote for you."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found him mafia. He knows I'm detective, so he's lying about Alice. Bob was killed by mafia, so Charlie must be the killer. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Bob was killed last night, so he must be mafia. Vote him out."
Charlie: "I think Alice is mafia; she accused Bob wrongly."
You: "I investigated Charlie and found him to be mafia. Bob was killed; the mafia must be Charlie. Alice, you are innocent."
Alice: "I agree with Diana. Bob was killed by mafia, so he was innocent. Charlie must be mafia. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "Alice, you are the mafia. Vote for you."
You: "I investigated Charlie and found him mafia. He knows I'm detective, so he's lying about Alice. Bob was killed by mafia, so Charlie must be the killer. Vote Charlie."
